)
sqlMap.update:
update t_system a set systemcode=systemcode
systemname=#systemname#
systemdefine=#systemdefine#
picturepath=#picturepath#
parentsystemcode=#parentsystemcode#
nodeorder=#nodeorder#
isleaf=#isleaf#
fullcode=#fullcode#
where 1=1
sqlMap.select:
select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.systemcode systemcode,a.systemname systemname,a.systemdefine systemdefine, a.picturepath picturepath,a.parentsystemcode parentsystemcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder, a.isleaf isleaf,a.fullcode fullcode,nvl(b.systemname,'顶级') parentsystemname from t_system a,(select systemcode ,systemname from t_system )b where a.parentsystemcode=b.systemcode(+)
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$
select count(1) a from t_system a,(select systemcode ,systemname from t_system )b where a.parentsystemcode=b.systemcode(+)

select a.systemcode systemcode,a.systemname systemname,a.systemdefine systemdefine,a.picturepath picturepath,a.parentsystemcode parentsystemcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.fullcode fullcode from t_system a where 1=1
order by a.systemcode

select a.systemcode systemcode,a.systemname systemname,a.systemdefine systemdefine, a.picturepath picturepath,a.parentsystemcode parentsystemcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder, a.isleaf isleaf,a.fullcode fullcode,nvl(b.systemname,'顶级') parentsystemname from t_system a,(select systemcode ,systemname from t_system )b where a.parentsystemcode=b.systemcode(+)
order by a.systemcode

select a.systemcode systemcode,a.systemname systemname,a.systemdefine systemdefine,a.picturepath picturepath,a.parentsystemcode parentsystemcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.fullcode fullcode from t_system a where ParentSystemCode = #systemcode# order by nodeorder
